chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
x: X
l: list X

Goal:
list_has_dup (x :: l) -> In x l \/ list_has_dup l

Premises:
Inductive list_has_dup : list X -> Prop := in_list_hd0 : forall l (x : X), In x l -> list_has_dup (x :: l) | in_list_hd1 : forall l (x : X), list_has_dup l -> list_has_dup (x :: l) Arguments list_has_dup _%list_scope Arguments in_list_hd0 _%list_scope Arguments in_list_hd1 [l]%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
in_list_hd1 : forall l (x : X), list_has_dup l -> list_has_dup (x :: l)
list_has_dup_sind : forall P : list X -> SProp, (forall l (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall l (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l, list_has_dup l -> P l
list_has_dup_ind : forall P : list X -> Prop, (forall l (x : X), In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> (forall l (x : X), list_has_dup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l, list_has_dup l -> P l
in_list_hd0 : forall l (x : X), In x l -> list_has_dup (x :: l)
incl_left_right_cons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l : list X) (y : X) (m : list X), incl (x :: l) (y :: m) -> y = x /\ In y l \/ y = x /\ incl l m \/ In x m /\ incl l (y :: m)
incl_right_cons_choose : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (l m : list X), incl m (x :: l) -> In x m \/ incl m l
list_injective_rect : forall (X : Type) (P : list X -> Type), P nil -> (forall (x : X) (l : list X), ~ In x l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list X, list_injective l -> P l
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> P l l' -> l' ~p l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, l ~p l0 -> P l l0
in_elt_inv : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (l1 l2 : list A), In x (l1 ++ y :: l2) -> x = y \/ In x (l1 ++ l2)
In_t : forall X : Type, X -> list X -> Type
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
list_dec : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {P x} + {Q x}) -> forall l : list X, {x : X | In x l /\ P x} + {forall x : X, In x l -> Q x}
list_assoc : forall X Y : Type, eqdec X -> X -> list (X * Y) -> option Y
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Exists_cons_hd : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l)
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
list_injective : forall X : Type, list X -> Prop
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Exists_cons_tl : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l)
elements_in_partition : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> forall x : A, In x l < -> In x l1 \/ In x l2
not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (x a : A) (l : list A), ~ In x (a :: l) < -> x <> a /\ ~ In x l
incl_cons_linv : forall (X : Type) (l m : list X) (x : X), incl (x :: m) l -> In x l /\ incl m l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l -> In (f x) (map f l)
nth_S_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d a : A), In (nth n l d) l -> In (nth (S n) (a :: l) d) (a :: l)
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
Forall_impl : forall (X : Type) (P Q : X -> Prop) (ll : list X), (forall x : X, In x ll -> P x -> Q x) -> Forall P ll -> Forall Q ll
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : nil ~p nil | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> x :: l ~p x :: l' | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), y :: x :: l ~p x :: y :: l | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, l ~p l' -> l' ~p l'' -> l ~p l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), In x (filter f l) < -> In x l /\ f x = true
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
in_flat_map_Exists : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (x : B) (l : list A), In x (flat_map f l) < -> Exists (fun y : A => In x (f y)) l
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)

inversion H.
